summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley between blocks 1 and 2, Star Addition, and blocks 1 and 2, Hagan's Extension to Star Addition, being the alley from West Halladay Street to West Wheller Street, between 7th Avenue West and 8th Avenue West; by paving and otherwise otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No.9909 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
